name: Portals From Fire
description:
PORTALS FROM FIRE  STORY 

Your boss decides to leave you alone to manage the a interdimentional portal transport company.

You, the company’s intern, have to keep the main generator from becomming unstable !

> Activate the portals to keep you from getting fired

> Activate the portals to keep you from setting the company on fire... For a time...

GOAL 

Survive by activating portals  in order to increase the timer and vent the excess power to prevent the inevitable as long as possible.

If the timer reaches 0... BOOM !

FEATURES 

Portal will spawn randomly on the map.

- Once activated they will spawn different things depending on their color.

 Blue ones will spawn walls that will block you

You can push some walls and destroys others (except for quantic wall who are alwayss teleporting)

 Red ones will spawn enemies

- They have various behavior, some will just wander on the map, others will actively chase you

 Green ones will spawn hazards on the floor

- Each one can inflict you with a debuff, including slow or inversed controls

 Once exhausted, the portals may leave a bonus or malus behind it

- You can get bonus to go faster, becomming invincible, shoot a laser, etc.

- When picking up a bonus, your boss might come to talk to you and spam your screen !

 Good Luck !
